resources.string: Enter the number you think it is

Guessing Game is an easy game where you have to guess the correct number. There are two modes; Time and Tries

Time more gives you 1 minute to come to an as high level as possible. For each level up, the range for the random number is increased by 10 times.

Tries mode gives you a number in a range according the the chosen difficulty:
Easy 0-10
Noraml 0-100
Hard 0-1000
Harder 0-10000
Insane 0-100000
The goal is to find the number in as few tries as possible

Have fun!

Made by Kwarkbit (kwarkbit.com)
(c) 2011
